definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: Its technical key is to explore straw resources and saprophagous food Chains.
sentences.chinese: 秸稈資源和腐食食物鏈的開發是技術關鍵。

sentences.english: They conquered a wilderness full of mutant beasts to arrive at the top of their food chain.
sentences.chinese: 他們征服了變異獸肆虐的荒野，踏上食物鏈的頂端。

sentences.english: An insect eating a leaf is a chain of one.
sentences.chinese: 昆蟲喫樹葉就是一條食物鏈的一層。

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with four species food-chain reaction-diffusion systems with time delays.
sentences.chinese: 本文考慮具有時滯的四種羣食物鏈反應擴散方程。

sentences.english: Its disappearance would therefore have a major impact on the entire marine food chain.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它的消失將對整個海洋食物鏈產生重大影響。

sentences.english: Like humans, they stand at the top of the marine food chain.
sentences.chinese: 像人類一樣，鯨魚也是處於海洋食物鏈的頂端。

sentences.english: Unicellular planktonic groups form the basis of the food chain in the deep sea.
sentences.chinese: 單細胞浮游生物是形成深海食物鏈的基礎。

sentences.english: They include disruption to the marine food web and effects on the world's carbon cycle.
sentences.chinese: 它們包括對海洋食物鏈破壞和對全球碳循環的影響。

sentences.english: The new criteria would remove the most hazardous products from the food chain altogether.
sentences.chinese: 新標準將徹底杜絕毒性最大的農藥污染食物鏈。

sentences.english: The impact may well have spread into the human food chain.
sentences.chinese: 污染影響的不僅僅是這些，還進入了人的食物鏈。

sentences.english: Nara melon, is a staple of Namib species at every rung of the food chain.
sentences.chinese: 它的瓜果餵養了納米比亞境內食物鏈上的各種動物。

sentences.english: In the environment, dioxins tend to accumulate in the food chain.
sentences.chinese: 在環境中，二噁英容易聚積在食物鏈中。

sentences.english: Exploiting detritus food chain is part of development system of grand agricultural re-sources.
sentences.chinese: 開發腐屑食物鏈是大農業資源開發系統之一。

sentences.english: The food chain has magnified the effect of the spill in other insidious ways.
sentences.chinese: 食物鏈以一種更隱蔽的方式放大了石油泄漏的影響。

sentences.english: A turtle eating the insect that eats the leaf makes a chain of two.
sentences.chinese: 龜喫掉喫葉子的昆蟲就形成了一條食物鏈上的兩層。

sentences.english: And at the base of the food web, tiny organisms that consume oil and gas are proliferating.
sentences.chinese: 通過食物鏈微小的油滴和天然氣成分進入了生態系統。

definition: reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
